text.autoconfig.restoredjungleedge.title: Restored Jungle Edge Configuration
text.autoconfig.restoredjungleedge.optio: Biome Rarity
Controls how rare the Modified Jungle Edge biome is (0-100). Lower values make it rarer.
Temperature Variance
Adjusts the temperature range where the biome can spawn. Higher values allow more flexible conditions.
Humidity Variance
Adjusts the humidity range where the biome can spawn. Higher values allow more flexible conditions.
Enable in Existing Worlds
Whether to generate the biome in already explored chunks. May cause terrain inconsistencies.
Replace Jungle Edge
Replace existing Jungle Edge biomes with Modified Jungle Edge. This change is permanent!
Max Trees Per Chunk
Maximum number of trees that can spawn per chunk (0-10).
Min Trees Per Chunk
Minimum number of trees that spawn per chunk (0-10).
Mega Tree Chance
Percentage chance for large 2x2 jungle trees to spawn (0-100%).
Vine Growth Chance
Percentage chance for vines to grow on trees (0-100%).
Vegetation Density
Number of vegetation patches per chunk. Higher values create denser ground cover.
Enable Cocoa Beans
Whether cocoa beans can grow on jungle trees in this biome.
Enable Melon Patches
Whether melon patches can spawn in this biome.
Enable Ocelots
Whether ocelots can spawn in this biome.
Enable Parrots
Whether parrots can spawn in this biome.
Ocelot Spawn Weight
Relative spawn weight for ocelots. Higher values mean more frequent spawns.
Parrot Spawn Weight
Relative spawn weight for parrots. Higher values mean more frequent spawns.
Hostile Mob Rate
Multiplier for hostile mob spawn rates (50-150%). 100% is normal rate.
Passive Mob Rate
Multiplier for passive mob spawn rates (50-150%). 100% is normal rate.
